members.name: getLineNumber
members.comment: The line number this locator is pointing to, or -1 if there is no column number available.

members.name: getColumnNumber
members.comment: The column number this locator is pointing to, or -1 if there is no column number available.

members.name: getByteOffset
members.comment: The byte offset into the input source this locator is pointing to or -1 if there is no byte offset available.

members.name: getUtf16Offset
members.comment: The UTF-16, as defined in [Unicode] and Amendment 1 of [ISO/IEC 10646], offset into the input source this locator is pointing to or -1 if there is no UTF-16 offset available.

members.name: getRelatedNode
members.comment: The node this locator is pointing to, or null if no node is available.

members.name: getUri
members.comment: The URI this locator is pointing to, or null if no URI is available.

name: org.w3c.dom.DOMLocator
comment:
DOMLocator is an interface that describes a location (e.g. where an error occurred).

See also the Document Object Model (DOM) Level 3 Core Specification.
